embeds.title: Device roles
embeds.description:
Hey kid! Wanna buy some... *roles*?

They're free, don't worry. Spice up your user with some color and rep your device manufacturer by assigning yourself a device role! React to this message by clicking on your desired device manufacturer's logo below: 

<:Acer:543439757162577945> <@&361817214187339786>
<:HP:543223459665281035> <@&361817226694885376>
<:Samsung:543546438941147176> <@&361817236958085142>
<:Google:543222275235905537> <@&361817292654247936>
<:ASUS:543245041561501696> <@&361817305652396032>
<:Lenovo:543224456957394954> <@&361817328641507331>
<:Toshiba:543545887914328065> <@&361817344856686592>
<:Dell:543224956625092629> <@&361817358907604994>
<:LG:543234585706889217> <@&506243988584529940>
<:CTL:808867943860404235> <@&808868437492629524>
You can remove roles from yourself at any time by reacting to the emoji again.
